001/*

004 */
005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.commands;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.CLIProcessor.CallingContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.ExitCode;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.ExitStatus;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.InvalidArgumentException;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.OptionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.AbstractTerminalCommand;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.DefaultExtraArgument;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.ExtraArgument;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.ICommandExecutor;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.DefaultConfiguration;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.IMutableConfiguration;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.MetaschemaException;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.ModuleLoader;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CustomCollectors;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.UriUtils;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.Format;
026import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.ISchemaGenerator;
027import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.ISchemaGenerator.SchemaFormat;
028import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.SchemaGenerationFeature;
029
030import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine;
031import org.apache.commons.cli.Option;
032import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
033import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
034
035import java.io.IOException;
036import java.io.OutputStream;
037import java.net.URI;
038import java.net.URISyntaxException;
039import java.nio.file.Files;
040import java.nio.file.Path;
041import java.nio.file.Paths;
042import java.util.Arrays;
043import java.util.Collection;
044import java.util.List;
045import java.util.Locale;
046
047import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
048
049public class GenerateSchemaCommand
050    extends AbstractTerminalCommand {
051  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(GenerateSchemaCommand.class);
052
053  @NonNull
054  private static final String COMMAND = "generate-schema";
055  @NonNull
056  private static final List<ExtraArgument> EXTRA_ARGUMENTS;
057  @NonNull
058  private static final Option OVERWRITE_OPTION = ObjectUtils.notNull(
059      Option.builder()
060          .longOpt("overwrite")
061          .desc("overwrite the destination if it exists")
062          .build());
063  @NonNull
064  private static final Option AS_OPTION = ObjectUtils.notNull(
065      Option.builder()
066          .longOpt("as")
067          .required()
068          .hasArg()
069          .argName("FORMAT")
070          .desc("source format: xml, json, or yaml")
071          .build());
072  @NonNull
073  private static final Option INLINE_TYPES_OPTION = ObjectUtils.notNull(
074      Option.builder()
075          .longOpt("inline-types")
076          .desc("definitions declared inline will be generated as inline types")
077          .build());
078
079  static {
080    EXTRA_ARGUMENTS = ObjectUtils.notNull(List.of(
081        new DefaultExtraArgument("metaschema-module-file-or-URL", true),
082        new DefaultExtraArgument("destination-schema-file", false)));
083  }
084
085  @Override
086  public String getName() {
087    return COMMAND;
088  }
089
090  @Override
091  public String getDescription() {
092    return "Generate a schema for the specified Module module";
093  }
094
095  @SuppressWarnings("null")
096  @Override
097  public Collection<? extends Option> gatherOptions() {
098    return List.of(
099        OVERWRITE_OPTION,
100        AS_OPTION,
101        INLINE_TYPES_OPTION);
102  }
103
104  @Override
105  public List<ExtraArgument> getExtraArguments() {
106    return EXTRA_ARGUMENTS;
107  }
108
109  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.PreserveStackTrace") // intended
110  @Override
111  public void validateOptions(CallingContext callingContext, CommandLine cmdLine) throws InvalidArgumentException {
112    try {
113      String asFormatText = cmdLine.getOptionValue(AS_OPTION);
114      if (asFormatText != null) {
115        SchemaFormat.valueOf(asFormatText.toUpperCase(Locale.ROOT));
116      }
117    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
118      InvalidArgumentException newEx = new InvalidArgumentException( // NOPMD - intentional
119          String.format("Invalid '%s' argument. The format must be one of: %s.",
120              OptionUtils.toArgument(AS_OPTION),
121              Arrays.asList(Format.values()).stream()
122                  .map(format -> format.name())
123                  .collect(CustomCollectors.joiningWithOxfordComma("and"))));
124      newEx.setOption(AS_OPTION);
125      newEx.addSuppressed(ex);
126      throw newEx;
127    }
128
129    List<String> extraArgs = cmdLine.getArgList();
130    if (extraArgs.isEmpty() || extraArgs.size() > 2) {
131      throw new InvalidArgumentException("Illegal number of arguments.");
132    }
133  }
134
135  @Override
136  public ICommandExecutor newExecutor(CallingContext callingContext, CommandLine cmdLine) {
137    return ICommandExecutor.using(callingContext, cmdLine, this::executeCommand);
138  }
139
140  @SuppressWarnings({
141      "PMD.OnlyOneReturn", // readability
142      "unused"
143  })
144  protected ExitStatus executeCommand(
145      @NonNull CallingContext callingContext,
146      @NonNull CommandLine cmdLine) {
147    List<String> extraArgs = cmdLine.getArgList();
148
149    Path destination = null;
150    if (extraArgs.size() > 1) {
151      destination = Paths.get(extraArgs.get(1)).toAbsolutePath();
152    }
153
154    if (destination != null) {
155      if (Files.exists(destination)) {
156        if (!cmdLine.hasOption(OVERWRITE_OPTION)) {
157          return ExitCode.INVALID_ARGUMENTS.exitMessage( // NOPMD readability
158              String.format("The provided destination '%s' already exists and the '%s' option was not provided.",
159                  destination,
160                  OptionUtils.toArgument(OVERWRITE_OPTION)));
161        }
162        if (!Files.isWritable(destination)) {
163          return ExitCode.IO_ERROR.exitMessage( // NOPMD readability
164              "The provided destination '" + destination + "' is not writable.");
165        }
166      } else {
167        Path parent = destination.getParent();
168        if (parent != null) {
169          try {
170            Files.createDirectories(parent);
171          } catch (IOException ex) {
172            return ExitCode.INVALID_TARGET.exit().withThrowable(ex); // NOPMD readability
173          }
174        }
175      }
176    }
177
178    String asFormatText = cmdLine.getOptionValue(AS_OPTION);
179    SchemaFormat asFormat = SchemaFormat.valueOf(asFormatText.toUpperCase(Locale.ROOT));
180
181    IMutableConfiguration<SchemaGenerationFeature<?>> configuration = new DefaultConfiguration<>();
182    if (cmdLine.hasOption(INLINE_TYPES_OPTION)) {
183      configuration.enableFeature(SchemaGenerationFeature.INLINE_DEFINITIONS);
184      if (SchemaFormat.JSON.equals(asFormat)) {
185        configuration.disableFeature(SchemaGenerationFeature.INLINE_CHOICE_DEFINITIONS);
186      } else {
187        configuration.enableFeature(SchemaGenerationFeature.INLINE_CHOICE_DEFINITIONS);
188      }
189    }
190
191    URI input;
192    String inputName = extraArgs.get(0);
193    URI cwd = Paths.get("").toAbsolutePath().toUri();
194
195    try {
196      input = UriUtils.toUri(extraArgs.get(0), cwd);
197    } catch (URISyntaxException ex) {
198      return ExitCode.IO_ERROR.exitMessage(
199          String.format("Unable to load '%s' as it is not a valid file or URI.", inputName)).withThrowable(ex);
200    }
201    assert input != null;
202    try {
203      ModuleLoader loader = new ModuleLoader();
204      loader.allowEntityResolution();
205      IModule module = loader.load(input);
206
207      if (LOGGER.isInfoEnabled()) {
208        LOGGER.info("Generating {} schema for '{}'.", asFormat.name(), input);
209      }
210      if (destination == null) {
211        @SuppressWarnings({ "resource", "PMD.CloseResource" }) // not owned
212        OutputStream os = ObjectUtils.notNull(System.out);
213        ISchemaGenerator.generateSchema(module, os, asFormat, configuration);
214      } else {
215        ISchemaGenerator.generateSchema(module, destination, asFormat, configuration);
216      }
217    } catch (IOException | MetaschemaException ex) {
218      return ExitCode.PROCESSING_ERROR.exit().withThrowable(ex); // NOPMD readability
219    }
220    if (destination != null && LOGGER.isInfoEnabled()) {
221      LOGGER.info("Generated {} schema file: {}", asFormat.toString(), destination);
222    }
223    return ExitCode.OK.exit();
224  }
225}
